#!/usr/bin/env bash
name="world"
if [ -n "$name" ]; then
  echo "hi $name"
fi
SELECT id, name FROM users WHERE active = true ORDER BY id DESC;

fn add(a: i32, b: i32) -> i32 { a + b }
fn main() { let x = add(1, 2); println!("{}", x); }

<?php
class User {
  public function __construct(private string $name) {}
  public function hello(string $to): string {
    return $this->name . ':' . $to;
  }
}
$u = new User('cat');
echo $u->hello('you');
